Package com.alyxferrari.jse3d.obj

Class Face

java.lang.Object
com.alyxferrari.jse3d.obj.Face
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Face>
public class Face
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Face>
Represents a collection of Triangles that form a face of an Object3D.
Since:
1.0 beta
Author:
Alyx Ferrari
See Also:
Serialized Form

      public double camDist
